subject: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Attn: Beneficiary,
Your Compensation Fund which is currently estimated at $1,000,000.00
[One Million US Dollars] has been approved by the United Nations [UN].
After the last survey/draw your email was randomly selected among
others to receive this Fund.
 You are advice to select from the options
below, the means by which you will like to receive your Fund:
Certified Bank Draft
ATM Debit Card
Feel free to contact this bona fide agent for further explanation;
Name: Felipe Aitken
Email: 
felipeaitken918@aol.com
Telephone: +22945584395
You have been correctly informed.
Regards,
Shawn Gad

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Shawn Gad,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate you letting me know about the approved fund from the United Nations. It sounds like a great opportunity.

I would like to learn more about the options available to receive the fund. Could you please provide me with some additional details about each option? Specifically, I am interested in knowing more about the process and any associated fees or charges.

Also, could you please clarify who the bona fide agent is that I should contact for further assistance? I want to make sure I am communicating with the right person.

Thank you again for sharing this information with me. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Joe

subject: Re: Dear Joe,
body:
Dear Joe,
I have read your response, I understand your perplexity. I will simply advise you to be positive, everything will work out well. Bank will be informed and involved in the process of payment of funds to you. The possible and applicable methods of transfer are ;
(1) A Certified Bank Draft: can be issued and dispatched to you for depositing at your local bank in order to cash into your bank account the compensation funds.
(2) For Cash Payment: your presence will be required here in the bank office to pay you the compensation in cash.
(3) For Swift Wire Transfer: the fund can be transferred to a bank account in your name. You will be required to provide your accountdetails as follows; (a) Bank Name (b) Bank Address (c) Your Account Number (d) Account Name (e) Swift Code
(4) The ATM card Module: ATM card is still an option; it still can be delivered to you if you do not choose any of the above 3 listed payment mediums.
Indicate your option by giving a response today to this e-letter.
Acknowledge receipt of this email and reply.
Regards,
Aitken Jeremy FelipeAddress: 9C3P+GM2, Rue de la Poste,Phone: +22945584395

subject: Re: Dear Joe,
body:
Hello Joe,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's good to know that there are different methods available for the transfer of funds. Can you provide more details on how the Certified Bank Draft process works? How long does it usually take for the funds to be available once the draft is deposited?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Joe

subject: Re: Dear Joe,
body:
Hello Joe,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your guidance on staying positive throughout this process. Could you please provide more details on how the Certified Bank Draft option works? How long does it usually take for the funds to be available once the draft is deposited at my local bank?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Joe
